description: Language fallback chain rules for missing translations

notes.schinese_tchinese: Simplified and Traditional Chinese do NOT fallback to each other to avoid confusion
notes.regional_variants: Regional variants (latam→spanish, brazilian→portuguese) fallback to their base language first
notes.ancient_languages: Ancient languages fallback to their modern equivalents when available, then English
notes.arabic: Arabic only fallbacks to English (no Hebrew fallback despite RTL similarity)
notes.rtl_languages: RTL languages (Arabic, Ancient Hebrew) do not cross-fallback to avoid layout issues
